lead_paragraph: Danica Patrick has a new partner on her team: Michael Andretti will work as her strategist. Patrick’s team, which is co-owned by Andretti, announced the move. The decision allows Kyle Moyer, who made the calls for Patrick’s No. 7 car last season, to fill the same role for Andretti’s son, Marco. Andretti, who won 42 races in his career, has never served as a strategist.
